title: Reign of Brayshaw
description:
A Top 20 Amazon Bestseller# 1 in New Adult Romance
In the world of morally corrupt teenagers, only the strongest survive ...
   "Trust only those who earn it." A sentiment I follow without direction but holds more consequence than ever before.One decision, five lives, three futures.This is what's at stake.One night, one choice, four broken Brayshaws.That is where we're headed.Unless I stop it.I have to stop it.I have to remind him of what he's chosen to forget.My town. My choice. My ending.-----Reign of Brayshaw is the highly anticipated conclusion to Maddoc and Raven's story, and the third in the Brayshaw series. This book must be read after both book one and two.
author: Meagan Brandy
